body:
Hi Ataur,

You can't connect a list directly to the sky component but you can use 'fly' or animate an slider. [Here](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Parametric_Daylight_Analysis&slide=0&scale=3.1748022830221068&offset=-4.955446620089617,-727.4060502875878) is an example on how to use fly.

Mostapha
